tool_description: Updates inventory system based on returned item condition and determines appropriate inventory disposition.

item_id.description: Unique identifier for the returned item

condition_status.description: Item condition: new, like_new, good, fair, poor, damaged

resale_eligible.description: Whether item is eligible for resale

error_messages: Invalid item_id: Item ID must be a non-empty string.
Invalid sku: SKU must exist in the product catalog.
Invalid condition_status: Status must be one of [new, like_new, good, fair, poor, damaged].
Invalid location: Location must be a valid warehouse or store identifier.
Inventory update failed: Unable to update inventory system.
usage: Use after item inspection and refund processing to update inventory records. Ensures accurate tracking of returned items.

disposition.description: Item disposition: restock, clearance, repair, dispose, donate

updated_quantity.description: New inventory quantity for this SKU
